content.detailedDescription: My family and i were coming home from picking up some food at the foot of the milton hill in kentucky. 3/4 of the way up the hill to the first curve my daughter and i noticed a strange object in the sky that was directly in front of us off in the distance across the river on the indiana side. it appeared to be out towards the hanover or lexington indiana area. it was long, black and skinny but solid. it was not completely straight, it appeared to be curved on the end but not like a hook, just slightly. may have been boomerang shaped depending on how the object was turned but looked straight with a curve on one end. it was very distinct in the sky and appeared to be quite large. i would say that it was an inch and a half long from where we were, which is several miles away. we watched the object and my husband was trying to see it without wrecking the car so he slowed down and we went around the curve and some trees obstructed our view and when we came back to a small clearing the object was gone. which means it literally disappeared. it was not clouds and there were vapor trails from planes around and they looked nothing like this thing. it was clearly solid and simply was there one second and gone the next. my daughter and i first remarked that it looked like a black worm in the sky or maybe a french fry. it really caught us off guard because i've been up that hill hundreds of times since i've lived here and it caught my eye instantly because it stuck out like a sore thumb. we only saw the object for around 10-15 seconds and then it disappeared.
content.summary: Saw dark worm-like object in the sky with daughter that disappeared...

content.detailedDescription: I will tell you in spanish my ingish is not very good ok, todos los dias que voy a trabajar enciendo el motor de mi troka, {camioneta} para que se caliete luego me voy a tirar la basura,  cuando volvi me iba a meter en la troka senti un impuso de mirar para ariba, como 5 pies arriba de un arbol como de 30 pies, que esta en la casa a mi derecha yo siempre pongo la troka con el frente asia la calle,entonces me fije que habia neblina extendi mi vista hacia la derecha y todo se miraba obscuro la neblina se habia extendido,luego volvi la vista hacia arriba frente a mi y note que la neblina iba avanzando hacia mi izquierda esactamente frente a mi pues podia mirar las estrellas y las luces de un avion parpadeando y la neblina avanzando de pronto mire tres luces orizontales amarillas redondas separadas y como dos alambres cruzandolas dos verticales  dos orizontales pero como que las tapaba una puerta pues no las vi cuando miraba hacia arriba  avanzaba despacio y silencosa aventando la neblina como una plancha tirando vapor y me dije por eso van donde esta el agua para cubrirse con ella eso no me asombra ni me asusta pues ya tuve axperiencias como esta un par de veces o mas en mi vida y e visto casi todos los programas de tv, esa misma noche desperte pues una lus azul muy brillante penetraba la ventana de la recamara no se que hora era pero era tarde pues yo me acuesto como a las 10 pm me quise levantar pero no pude me volvi a dormir les conte a mis companeros de trabajo pero no me cryeron y se rieron de mi ya no dije nada,jente cerrada de cabeza ignorante de lo que pasa adederredor.
content.summary: Next.

content.detailedDescription:
My mother, sister, and myself (moms 73, sister will be 51, i'm 53)had dropped my cat of at a 24hr animal hospital and was on our way back home. i spotted these 2 very bright lights on e directly above the other, asuming they were airplanes i just continuted to watch but they didn't seem to move. after awhile because of the road turning they had been on the passenger side, but became eventually on the drivers side. i finaaly mentioned it to my mother and sister so my sister pulled in to a strip mall and watched it for a couple of minutes and it didn't move. we went on to my sisters house and they were still just sitting there in the sky, so a got a chair and went outside and sit and watch them for about 10 minutes (my brother-in-law also came out and saw them)they would get brighter then dim. i waited and my other sister came over (she is an airline stewart so she asumed it was an airplane at first also)and i asked her to drive me in the direction of the lights out in the country for a better look. we stopped periodically to see if there was any moment. the one on top moved slightly to the right of the one underneath it, they kept diming and then brighten. we were out in the country for aroud 15 minutes and they seem to move down closer to the ground, and as we were watching the bottom one start to dim and just disappear about 5 minutes latter the other one did the same thing. there is noway these were planes, balloons, helicopters, or stars, just noway!

chris helton
content.summary: Saw 2 really bright lights 1 above the other stationary that just disappeared while wathching.

content.detailedDescription: At about 6:15pm i went outside to get some things from my truck, and noticed a bright star moving in the western sky. it was brighter than any other star in the sky. i wanted a picture, so i took my items inside and grabbed a cell phone camera, and returned outside. at first i did not think it real, but then i wanted to show someone else what i had seen. the object had moved over top of a neighbors house about 150 yards away to the west. i placed the camera on the truck's roof to stabilize the shot. all of a sudden the object made a visible looping trail and i snapped the shot. the reddish glow at the bottom of the picture is the front porch light of the neighbors house. the object then sped away to the north-west and faded away to nothing.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Saw bright star moving. then made fast loops. then moved away fast.

content.detailedDescription: The two starlike objects are venus and jupiter vertically close to each other, dec 1, we should see a patial crescent moon near the two planets. i believe this will not happen again until 2052. they are in the sw sky. i read about it on the internet. it was to begin thanksgiving evening and go into next week.
content.summary: Jupiter & venus will be vertical to each other, crescent moon will come soon.

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were traveling north on i-77 at approximately 0300. we both noticed a bright green light in the sky that looked like a flare. we both agreed it wasn't a flare and watched it for a few more seconds before it just disappeared. when we got on our flight later that morning we met an old woman who had heard about these green lights all over ther world. i looked into it a little and it sounds like it was a simple meteor but you never know. i was hoping ot find someone who had their camera at the ready and took a photo or a video. [cms/tg/pid]
content.summary: Green light streaking across the night sky.

content.detailedDescription:
Yesterday i finally took a good look at these 2 peculiar bright objects in the sky, i've been seeing them for at least 3 days in a row. but yesterday i got my camera to see what the heck these things were doing, so bright, when i could hardly see any other star in the sky, because of all the cloudiness, in the night. they were a long distance apart, but vertical to each other. the object at the bottom was way triple the size or more of the object above it. i videotaped it, and as i was doing so, the bottom bright sphere faded out and then back in.I didn't think of reporting it and deleted the footage, because i felt somebody will shrug it off as stars, but now that i read all the accounts of the same thing these past few days, i know that this isn't some normal thing. i will take footage again tonight, and send you pictures. 

also, what i find odd is that just last friday, i went outside and witnessed the oddest resilient silver sphere, that looked like a glowing balloon in the night, with what looked like ridiculous red, green and white lights alternately flickering on it. this object seemed so surreal, like a 3d cartoon in the sky. it hovered on the area in the distance above the houses to the east of my house, and then it slowly lowered behind the trees in the distance. i unfortunately did not expect this to happen, and didn't have enough battery in my cam, but nonetheless, i ran to get it and caught the object for a few seconds. i had to climb a ledge to get the scarce footage, but when i uploaded it to myspace video, the quality of the footage was degraded and did not look as clear as it did on my exilim camera. i'm afraid of this happening again tonight. but nontheless, i will take footage, because whatever these two bright starlike objects are, they've been lingering in the sky for days.

the pictures below are of the object that i caught on the previous friday. i will let you know that the sky above my house is an itinerary of planes to lax , i believe. but the vague pic with red is the one of the object i saw that night, i also believe the white object was the same thing, but my cam kept turning off as the battery was so low. as for the two star-like objects, they were in a completely different part of the sky, and were immobil. i will try to take pics of these other objects tonight.
content.summary: 2 bright objects apart and vertical. bigger one faded and reappeared. also, last friday, an unsual green, blue, and white light flickering ufo at night.

content.detailedDescription:
I'm not sure of the exact date and have been watching this sight since last february to see if anyone else might report an old sighting in erath county, considering all the activity there in the past year, but i've seen nothing reported in that area/time period like what we saw, so here goes.

the best i can recall is that it was probably a friday or saturday night during the late spring of 1989. my husband was working late and my daughter was not at home. my in-laws lived down the road from us, but were out of town, so my son and i were alone at our rural erath county home. we were watching tv and waiting for my husband to get home when i suddenly felt the foot stool begin to vibrate slightly, then the couch started to vibrate, and the light bulbs in the ceiling fan began to rattle a bit. my son, who would have been 6 years old at the time if my memory is correct and this happened in the spring of '89, jumped off the couch and said "what the heck is that?". my first thought was an earthquake, but having never experienced one, i didn't know what it was for sure. 

i opened the front door to look outside and saw this "thing" before i ever stepped out the door. my son was right behind me and followed me onto the porch even though i told him to stay in the house. this craft was huge. it was at least 5 or 6 times the size of our house. i took about 3 or 4 steps out into the yard and looked directly up at the underside of this thing. it was a clear night and i don't recall any lights on the object, although my son says there were lights. i just remember being amazed at the size, the fact that it was only a few feet above our house, and there was absolutely no noise coming from the thing. it was like it was slowly floating over the house. i would compare it's speed to someone leisurely riding a bicycle, if even that fast.

as i said, i don't recall any lights, but i could clearly make out the shape of the object as it passed overhead simply because it blocked out the sky and was low enough that i could tell it was dark colored, darker than the sky. 

i don't remember being frightened although i do remember some thought of radiation exposure going through my mind, so i kept telling my son to go back in the house. i think i must have become a little concerned about the sighting because i quickly followed him back inside. this is where i really feel strange about the whole thing. we watched this thing pass over the house, which didn't take but about 30 seconds, but instead of watching it out a window, we both went back inside, sat down, and started watching tv again. anyone that knows me will tell you that's not a normal reaction for me. i'm curious, or maybe even nosy, but anyway that was very odd behavior for my son and very odd especially for me. that's the one thing that has bothered me all these years. i could have watched this thing for miles because of the way our house was situated on the top of a hill and instead i just went back to my tv show. i have no idea where it went from that point. i don't know if it followed the road, or the creek that runs behind that house, or if it took off in a completely different direction.

when my husband got home a little later that night we told him about seeing this craft and as i recall we were pretty calm about the whole thing. he suggested that it was probably one of the new stealth aircrafts he had heard about, but he also told us not to tell anyone else we saw the thing *laugh*. as soon as we got internet service a few years later, i began to look up stealth aircraft and then ufos. the thing that my son and i saw that night looked nothing like any of the stealth planes i've seen photos of, but it did look like a lot of the pictures and drawings i've seen of the triangular ufos. 

i'm not too concerned about what we saw that night, so long ago, but i am still bothered about our reaction to seeing it. it was just so out of character for either of us to behave the way we did that night. not a day goes by that i don't at least wonder about it........
content.summary: Very slow silent triangle.

content.detailedDescription: At approximately 6:30- 7:00 pm my friend and i were outside in the backyard when i noticed, very high up in the sky, a tiny flashing dot. at first, we assumed the obvious. a flashing, blinking light high up in the night sky is a jet. however, within the five minutes we kept our eyes on it, it barely moved across the sky. scale wise, it moved from one side of some tree branches to the trees opposite side in the slow time of approximately 5 minutes. too slow to be a jet, yet much too fast to be stars moving across the horizon. the flashing light was so high up it was about the size of a tiny star. we watched it for the 5 minutes when it suddenly seemed to just disappear or stop blinking.
content.summary: Very slow moving tiny blinking light that seemed to disappear.

content.detailedDescription: I was in my girlfriends garden when i looked up in the sky.It was a clear night and i could see planes very clearly in the sky.Where my girlfriends garden is,there is a nature reserve at the back of her garden so there are no street lights and no light pollution.Anyway,i was looking up and seen a star like object moving.I then realised there was another star like object in front and that this object was connected.I was extemely shocked as the object must of been massive.It was very high in the sky and i knew it was massive because we see planes all the time in the sky and they are only tiny in comparrison,even when at a low altitude.I could not make out the exact shape of the object but the two lights, one at each end of the object gave me a rough idea that she object was very long and straight.I immediatly called my girlfriend and she run in the back garden along with her daughter.My girlfriend also saw the object for about 5 to 10 seconds before it dissapeared.My girlfriends daughter only saw the back light before it dissapeared.It was ammazing as we love to look at the stars at night and we see numerous objects in the sky from planes to satalites to meteors burning up.But nothing like this.This object must of been absolutely massive.I was amazed whilst my girlfriend was both exited and scared at the same time.The object looked like it was moving slowish, but that was hard to judge,because of the vehicles apparent size and also we did not know the exact altitude,althuogh because of planes in the sky,the object seemed to be at a very high alltitude,which would of meant it might be as big as a mile or more in length.The lights on the object just faded out as it moved further away, that is why my girlfriends daughter only saw the back light as the front light had already faded.
content.summary: Massive object  with lights at either end.

content.detailedDescription: While traveling west on i-80 in central iowa i looked to my southwest and saw 2 star like objects perpindicular to each other, looked somewhat odd, later i looked to sw and they were gone, object on bottom seem to be dimming in and out, object on bottom was larger and brighter.Could not estimate distance.
content.summary: 2 objects in sw sky aligned on top of one another.

content.detailedDescription:
It was about 10 o'clock at night and i was standing outside my house. stretching out my back i bent over to the side and pointed my had upward, stretching it to the sky, and looking upward. suddenly, over the trees in the distance came to flying red circular objects. they were flying side by side, strait in my direction. as it got closer i could see that it was connected by cylinder. the craft apperaed to be black with red lights on the bottom. the best way i could describe it is like two old 45 records with red lables, connected by a pipe. it is hard to say how high it was, i would guess about 1000 ft. each disk was the size of a house, and it was flying very fast, maybe 200 mph. it went almost directly over me, not making a sound, and going on a strait path. it passed over a tree in my front yard, and i tried to run around it to see the craft, but it was gone. 

i have seen a ufo before when i was 13 that was a single flying saucer hovering over my neighbors houses, so when i saw this one, i really tried to study it.

it apeared to be black, but it was at night, so it could of been silver. barbell shaped, with one red ciruclar light under each disk. the disks were three dementional, how thick i am not sure.

after it flew by i was left feeling blown away. i don't know if this is aliens, goverment, or people from the future. time will tell.
content.summary: Barbell shaped but flat. circle of red light on the bottom. flew right over my head very fast.

content.detailedDescription:
Was comming home with my boss john who was a scottish religious man who hid from evertone alot. while on hiway108 in california foothills. i had just asked him if he beleived in ufo and then suddenly comming over the foothills comming our way, at night. it was flying very low just above us with a seperate vehickel that was red was towing the big disk. i grabed his camera and as we steped out it was finnaly above us. i could see all kinds of lights on its bottom making a low humming from it. as it flew over it just continued on its way over the crossing herizon. the most shocking thing was, as the next week went by i saw the man driving with me at the time had showed me one of the pictures. as he did i jokenly said watch out someone will get you for the picture. two weeks latter the man with the photo died!I latter learnd he had come to the us with a fake visa. he was from the country of scottland, aqnd had something to do with the kgb. and like most people at the church in the seirra and nevadas they were hidding food and weapons for the end of the world.John the man who drove the night of the photo worked for the scottesh military.And was hidding at this church.Well although hard to beleive these are defferently
the end times[at least for john]
content.summary: Disc with red light following and then towing the low flying object [lots of color].

content.detailedDescription:
I could go on and on about just sitting on my porch and watching the sky, i can say this it all started about a month ago, and now it has progressed into items where i am thinking i am going crazy, my neighbor has seen it, former roommate, my wife, my kids during the day using led light blinking during cloud coverage seening lights blink back, my coworker during day watching a light that was red at times but shiny create a cloud that didn't move, while all others moving, seeing dark masses in white clouds popping in and out during night.  im a realist, but due to the current things i have seen i have fear that is overwhelming, i know what jets can do as well as choppers, but the laws of phyiscs are being broken by motions, sudden speeds that jets would make a sonic sound and these have no sounds i have seen planes come out of nowhere about 5 minutes after seeing these events, so many to list whats going on i cant sleep at night, i now wake up at 3 to 4 am nightly to every other night.

  all i know is that being scared and a feeling of being sick after seeing these things as well as others, still i want to go outside and try to see something else even though the fear gets a little overwhelming
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.shape: Diamond,  Disc,  Fireball,  Flash,  Star-like,  Triangle,  Other
content.summary: Saw red lights moving in sky, then a saucer shoot off

content.detailedDescription: This is an attachment to event or id number 14114. the second picture did not come through. so i am resending it.
content.summary: Two star like objects sw sky.

content.detailedDescription:
I went outside with my dog approx.7:15pm. i looked up towards the sw and saw two very very bright lights. one above the other. one was smaller than the other. the smaller of the two was above the other. they were approx. 10-15 miles away from me. not high in the sky at all. you can see that when you look at my pictures.

i went back inside real quick to get my camera. went back out and took a few pictures. first two were clear. rest got shaky. the lights seemed to be very very bright and then dim just slightly, enough to notice it though. then i went back inside to download the pics. 

i did not go back out for awhile,as i had other commitments. when i did go back out around 11:00pm they were gone. stars were out though. just none like or as bright as what i took pictures of.

my husband asked me what i was doing and i told him taking pics.Of the sky and he said that he had seen them out there about an hour or so before me..He is used to seeing things in our sky here. i am too. this is the 3rd report i have sent in to mufon.
content.summary: Two bright lights. one above the other. stationary approx. 2+hrs.Then gone! the lights were in the sw sky. pictures included.

content.detailedDescription:
This sighting began as i was looking out the window while on the phone. i noticed two lights and immediately grabbed binoculars. the lights appeared to be disc shaped, not round or star like but it was impossible to be sure from the distance. at times it seemed they dimmed and then got brighter. i then went outside to get a better look. the top light was dimmer than the bottom one. they were both significantly lower than any other stars in the sky. there is a lot of light pollution in the area so i could tell they were extremely bright. the lights moved so slowly that they appeared stationary. i kept an eye on them for the next half an hour and they were starting to slowly make their way west. i got in my car with a friend and we watched them on our way out to the highway. it was at this point they finally moved out of site after roughly an hour of watching them.

i should mention i have seen many strange things in this area including a massive orb next to a chemtrail as it was being sprayed, lightning striking in a very concentrated area for over an hour, a mile wide rainbow cloud and a flaming potentially hazardous asteroid that was the size of the sun. i always check the skies, day or night, as it appears to be a lively spot in many respects.
content.summary: 2 very bright/low lights on top of one another, moving slowly in unison.

content.detailedDescription:
Terrible objeto en hoduras  tornabe tela sobrevolando la zona 

logramos capturar uno  y los demas fueron heridos y se encuentran en refrigeracion para ser analizados y  exponer las imagenes en youtube
aqui se veran las imagenes pronto... http://www.Youtube.Com/user/aliensevidence
content.summary: Terrible objeto en honduras tornabe tela sobrevolando la zona.

content.detailedDescription:
Era un objeto gris con partes redondeadas y barios orificios de donde expulsabas luz brillante

emitia un sonido agudo como por ejemplo corto sircuito,  
se podia sentir la presion cuando se asercaba  y de pronto se desaparecio
no era algo de this planet  porque logramos hacerle varios disparos con calibre 9.Mm  y no afecto en nada como si su material fuera  oponente al  plomo.  curiozo
content.summary: Era un objeto gris con partes redondeadas y barios orificios de donde expulsabas luz brillante.

content.detailedDescription:
At 6pm on november 24th i was returning to my vehicle after deer hunting.  the vehicle was parked on the north side of riverside drive, facing west, in ionia state park.  while changing my clothes and exchanging text messages with my father, regarding the days hunt, some motion caught my eye.  in the south west a light the shape of a 4 pointed star was moving toward the north east.  there were 2 quite bright stars in the direct area where i initially noticed the light.  at first i thought that perhaps i had seen a satellite, or possibly even the space shuttle or space station, as there was no noise, the light was white with no color and seemed to me to be traveling quite rapidly. the point of the star shape at the leading edge did not appear to necessarily be the front point of any object that it might have been, as it did not always appear to be immediately pointed in the direction that the light was moving.
it occurred to me as the light faded out of sight past the town that the stars all had halos around them, and the light did as well, but not until it was over the city and almost out of sight.  it did not when it went past me.  i was approximately 3 linear miles from the town of ionia, and the object appeared to have the halo around it when it was over the town.
i would estimate that the object was visible to me for about 45 seconds, and traveled roughly 6 to 7 miles in that time.  the light was bright (it was the brightest object in the sky), clear, and well defined as it went past me.
as i watched the light it occurred to me that i might be seeing a ���ufo���, i actually texted my father a message stating that i thought that i was seeing a ufo, and although i had my digital camera sitting in the vehicle, on the seat in front of me i did not take a picture.  i thought that it would only be a white spot on a black background, and not helpful.  i regret this.
i have included a simple picture of the light that i saw.  the point of the light that is longer was the leading point, and was about that much longer than the other points.
content.summary: 4 pointed star moved from sw to ne rapidly with no sound.

content.detailedDescription: Coming home and saw low in the southwest sky two very bright star like objects. they were vertically in line with each other. the one on the bottom was extremely larger and brighter than the one just above it. took my husband outside and he saw them also. went back out about 10 minutes later and they were gone. does anyone know if one or both were planets maybe. had a feeling that they weren't. pretty cool!
content.summary: Two very bright star like objects.

content.detailedDescription:
My husband and i went outside our home in warner nh at approximately 6 pm. there were 2 extremely bright objects hovering above the treeline. one was just above the tree line from where i stood on a deck that is slightly elevated. there was a second object that hovered directly perpendicular above the first, and they seemed to move in conjuction.  the lights radiated from the craft at the treeline in the form of beams in all directions from the center straight out.  the intensity of the light on both objects started out very strong, the one at the tree line strongest at first, but then the second became brighter. their movements were erratic, hovering yet moving slightly within a small area on the horizon line. i observed this activity until both lights disappeared - roughly 30 minutes. 

three witnesses (including myself) look at this skyline on a daily basis and have never seen any celestial bodies previously in this location at the stated time. 2 other witnesses who showed up during this period had witnessed the lights while travelling: one on 89 southbound from lebanon, and the other headed northbound on 89 from concord.
content.summary: 2 extremely bright objects hovering perpendicular to each other just above tree line, changing intensities in brightness and then dissapearing.

content.detailedDescription:
Was coming back fron shopping at local grocery. girlfriend was driving. we both saw it at the same time. height was just above the standard, wood utility poles along side the roadway. it crossed the roadway, the lights went out then whoooosh! it took off in two blinks of an eye, upward toward the south,but we could see it as it climbed upward and out of sight.The truck windows were rolled up, the radio off. it traveled slowly till it got to the utility poles, then turned off the lights and sped off.It traveled straight for a very short distance, then straight up, leaving a dark trail of ?? behind it. we believe, now. . 

we were traveling west on us hwy 10, coming from brillion, wi, back home to forest jct, wi. they are 4 miles apart.It was the brightness of the object that caught our attention.Our first thought about what it was?Ufo .
it was spherical, saturn like, lights around center.Feelings? excelerated, hyper, breathless,excited, scared, wont be able to sleep for a while, tonight, and more of a believer then i was befor. we kept driving,but slowed down, and watched till it was out of sight. the night was cold, clear, and bright with stars. very little light pollution, as this is farm country out here.
content.summary: Was in passenger seat of pu truck. looked up, saw it going south (fm right to left) and crossed right in front of truck. full dark out.In country.

content.detailedDescription: N/a
content.summary: Two extremely bright spheres of light that  are perpendicular to each other and they appear stationary.

content.detailedDescription:
The top light was smaller than the bottom light, the bottom light was bigger and brighter. they were there for about an hour and then they just shot off and i could no longer see them.
i noticed them because they were so bright, at first i thought they were lights from a tower but i realized there is no tower in the area i saw the lights and they weren't blinking and there was no red light at the top for aircraft, so i continued to watch the lights until they took off.
it was very exciting when i realized that i had just seen something i couldn't explain. my cousin and mother both saw the ligths.
content.summary: There were two lights one on top of the other about a mile or so apart.

content.detailedDescription:
I watched this vertical baton move slowly an d silently for 2 hrs; binoculars on lower sphere; looked exactly like a planet, with maplike surface, rotating completely in about 1 second, rotating from right to left.
i am a retired police officer.
content.summary: Vertical; top sphere like a bright star; lower sphere big

content.detailedDescription:
My friend and i were on our way to a friends house, we were driving down the great highway right off the beach and my friend mentioned that she smelled gun powder and i told her it may be a bond fire or something.  i looked to my left facing the ocean side and i noticed strange lights.  it formed a v-shape.  ther was 1 bigger light at the bottom an two smaller lights on each side forming a wide v-shape.  it looked quite big, i didn't see any form of the shape, it was suspended over the ocean and made no noise.  my friend was so scared that it would be coming our direction that she ran all the red lights.  i didn't feel scared i was very curious.
we parked half a mile down to get a better look but it was already gone.
content.summary: 5 lights formed a v-shape over ocean beach, san francisco.

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were on assignment to take pictures of area cotton gins for a local business. we took the pictures on oct. 8,2008 at about 12:40 in the afternoon.  when we loaded the images on the computer we noticed that one of them had an image on it that was not observed at the time of shooting.  on closer examination we looked at the next image taken less than 5 seconds later and the object in question is not there.  we have taken pictures professionally for ten years and do not have an explanation for what the object is.  the attached image has not been altered in any way.  the camera was a canon 5d with a 24-70l lens with a shutter speed of 1/200 of a second.
content.summary: The object is cigar shaped with two fins on each side of the main bady.

content.detailedDescription: At 5am i got up to get water and noticed a flashing light in the sky. it was a perfect clear night. i watched this object for 15mins from 5am-5:15am before i decided to call my parents and see if they could see it too. they could. it was flashing randomly sometimes fast, sometimes slow green red and white. i call the local police and an officer came out. we stood outside and watched it for while. he couldn't explanin why it was so close and acting the way it was. he saw the colors and flashing as well. as the sun started to come up it moved furter and furter west faster and faster. even though by then the other stars in the night sky had dissapeared, this on still remained. it moved further west but now and then was still blinking. it was the coolest thing to see ever! me and my parents tried to get photos but i couldn't even get it to show up on my difital camera. my mom did get a picture but it is blurry.
content.summary: I saw a bright object hovering and flashing green white and red. my parents saw it and the local police as well. i was close enough to be a plane but it wasn't. it seemed to bob-about but the light show was like nothing i have ever seen!

content.detailedDescription:
Ok at around 5 20 am i went out for a smoke.  i see what looks like a worm hole and then a light comes through it.  it stops once its through the circular like hole.  then it starts to move slowly north.  it gets to probably a half mile away, i can now see that it is very very large, the size of 4 jets stacked on top of each other and probably twice as long.  it has 3 seperate red lights that strobe, and a 2 or 3 bright white flood lights.  i wish i had a better camera, one that can take very bright video during night time, and one that can zoom, and focus manually.  i have seen many ufo's at this house.  this is not the first, second, or third this year.  i seen a ufo a few nights ago, 6 hours after the fireball happend in north dakota.

this event that happened tonight, would of been visible from grand rapids by 5:40 am
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Large and loud!
